job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of creating and managing data extraction, transformation, and loading processes, which is a core component of data engineering.
Integrating new data sources is a typical data engineering task that involves making data from various origins accessible and usable within a system.

job_tasks.phrase: create foundational data models in our data warehouse
job_tasks.justification: Building data models in a data warehouse is a key data engineering responsibility, focusing on structuring data for analysis and reporting.

job_tasks.phrase: make their queries and tables efficient
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing the performance of data structures and access methods is a data engineering task related to data usability and efficiency.
Collecting business requirements is a foundational step in understanding how technical solutions align with business needs, a key aspect of Business Understanding.
While seemingly broad, in the context of data, defining successful outcomes for data models and pipelines relates to meeting specific data-driven business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage raw data in our data warehouse to build a curated data models
job_tasks.justification: This describes the transformation of raw data into structured, usable data models, a core data engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Write production quality ELT code (Python, SQL)
job_tasks.justification: Writing production-quality code, even if for data pipelines, falls under software development practices and skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and maintain architecture and systems documentation
job_tasks.justification: Documenting data systems and architecture is a crucial part of data engineering to ensure maintainability and understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain our data catalog as a scalable resource
job_tasks.justification: Managing a data catalog involves organizing and describing data assets, which is a data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide data modeling expertise to all team members through code reviews, pair programming, and training to help deliver optimal, DRY, and scalable database designs and queries
job_tasks.justification: This involves sharing expertise in data modeling and database design, a key function within data engineering, and promoting best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Become a domain expert in the data you are work with
job_tasks.justification: Gaining domain expertise in data is essential for understanding business context and effectively translating data into business insights, aligning with Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: improve, manage, and teach code maintainability and performance standards in code submitted and reviewed
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on code maintainability and performance standards, and teaching these to others, is a software development best practice.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and improve the infrastructure for data collection, processing, management and analysis
job_tasks.justification: This broadly covers the responsibilities related to the underlying systems and infrastructure for data operations, a core part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, design, implement and drive new solutions and software for solving complex data processing problems
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the full software development lifecycle for solving data processing challenges, including research, design, and implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on our internal tools to make the data easily accessible to our internal stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Developing internal tools to facilitate data access is a software development activity focused on user experience and data enablement.

soft_skills.phrase: work in a cross-functional team with product managers, data scientists, data engineers and developers
support other data specialists in their work
Provide data modeling expertise to all team members through code reviews, pair programming, and training

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes data engineering and traditional software development practices for data pipelines and warehouses. While it mentions working with data scientists, there is no indication of core AI or ML model development, fine-tuning, or generative AI tasks required for the GenAI Engineer profile.
